_header: Saint Benedict he was I-bore in the land of Nursia
Note: For a variant text in some MSS see 4560.
Subjects: saints’ lives; Benedict of Nursia, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Benedict in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn benet was ibore in þe lond of mursieTo rome he was wel
                    ȝong isend to lerny of clergie…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou god uor þe loue of seynt benet ous lete þen wei
                    wende& to þe Ioie þat he is Inne to him come aten
                    ende
BodAsh43.Editions:
McCann,  Justin. 
             “Early English Verses on St. Benedict.” 
             Downside Review
         41 (1928): 44-56: 48-53 (with corrections from Oxford,  Corpus Christi College 431).
Whatley,  Gordon E.,
                        ed.  
             Saints’ Lives in Middle English Collections.
         With Anne B. Thompson and Robert K. Upchurch. MI: Western Michigan
            University for TEAMS, 2004.

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint benet was I bore in þe lond of vrcyeto rome he was wel
                    ȝong I sent to lerne clergye…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now god for þe loue of seint benet vs lete þat wey to
                    wende& to þe ioye þat he is in to hym come at þe
                    ende

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint benet was y bore in lond of mursyeto Rome he was wel y send
                    to leorne clergye…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Now gor [sic] for þe loue of seint B vs let þat
                    way wendeAnd to þe ioye þat he in is Comme atte nende
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint benet was born in þe lond of vrsyeTo rome he was wol
                    ȝong sent for to lere clergie…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…God for þe loue of seint benyt lete vs þat weiȝe
                    wendeAnd to þe ioye þat he is inne to him mote we comme atte
                    ende

OxfCCC431.First Lines:
Seint beneth was ibore in þe lond of musieTo Rome he was wel
                    ȝonge isend to lerne of clergie…
OxfCCC431.Last Lines:
…him firu sulf he strupte anon among þornes he him
                    ta[ ]& brumeles & turnde him here & þer & al his fleis
                    to r[ ]…
OxfCCC431.Note:
Ends imperfectly due to lost leaves at end of volume; ends of lines
                    cropped or worn.
OxfCCC431.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.122.

OxfTri57.First Lines:
Seint Benet was ybore in þe lond of vrsyeTo rome he was wel
                    ȝong y sent to lerne clergye…
OxfTri57.Last Lines:
…Now god for þe loue of Seint Benet vs lete þe wey
                    wendeAnd to þe ioye þat he ys ynne come at þe
                    ende
OxfTri57.Attributed Title:
Vita Sancti Benedicti Abbatis (rubric marginal note by scribe, f.
                        3v); Benedictus (RT)

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein benet him was ibore in þe lond of murcieTo rome he was
                    wel ȝong ysend to lerin of clergie…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou god for loue of sein benet us lete þane wel wendeAnd
                    to þe ioie þat he is Inne to him come atte nende

Seint Benet was ybore in þe lond of MurcyeTo Rome he was wel
                    ȝong ysend to leorne of clergye…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now god ffor þe loue of Seint Benet vs lete þan wey
                    wendeAnd to þe ioye þat he is ynne to him come atten
                    ende

CamTCC605.First Lines:

                    Yonge sende to lerne clergie…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Now god for þe loue of hym ous lete þat wey
                    wende& to þat ioie þat he is Inne to hym come atte
                    nende

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEin Benet he was y bore in þe lond of murcieTo Rome he was
                    wel ȝong y sende to lerny of clergie…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint benet he was ibore in þe lond of mursieto rome he was wel ȝong isent to lerne of clergie…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou god for þe loue of seint benet ous late þeb wei wende& to þe ioie þat he is Inne to him come atte nende
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xxiiii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 49v).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Benet was ibore in þe toun of MersieTo rome he was ȝong sent to lerne clergie…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Now god for þe loue of him vs lete þat weie wendeAnd to þe ioie þat he is inne to him come ate nende

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEint benet was ybore in þe londe of vrsteTo Rome he was wel ȝonge ysend to lerne clergie…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Nou god vor þe loue of seint benet ous lete þan wey wendeTo þe ioye þat he is inne þat lestiþ wyþoute ende
BLEge2810.Note: Part of text inserted on a half-sized leaf (f. 46-46v) between ff. 45 and 47: 35 lines beginning “þer beside was a prest þat hat florentyne”; ends “Amen.”

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEyn benet hym was ybore in þe lond of murcyeTo rome he was wel ȝong ysend to leorny of clergie…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …A ston hy founde swuþe fair to hore work wel god & cleneAl þe folk þat þere was ne miȝte him heble of ene…
BLEge2891.Note: Ends incomplete, due to loss of folio or folios between 38 and 39.
BLEge2891.Attributed Title: De sancto Benedicto (rubric in margin, f. 38)

BLHar2277.First Lines: …Ac þe Message was vnhende þat o coftret forþ he berÞat oþer he hudde bi þe wey to nyme hamward þer…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Nou god for þe loue of Seint benett ous lete þane wey wende& to þe ioye þer he is inne Come att an ende
BLHar2277.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 2277.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=0&ref=Harley_MS_2277.

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Benet was yboor in þe lond of nurcyeTo Rome was he
                    þough ysent to lerne clergie…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…God for þe loue of seynt Benet vs lete þat way
                    wendeTo þe ioye þer he is Inne we come at last eende.
                    Amen.
